title: The Sinister Reason They Removed Our Tonsils And Wisdom Teeth- DNA Harvesters of Sorrow
text:
By 50 Shades of Pissed Off
Total:
The Sinister Reason They Removed Our Tonsils And Wisdom Teeth- DNA Harvesters of Sorrow
Friday, January 19, 2018 18:36
% of readers think this story is Fact. Add your two cents.
What Did They Do With Your Tonsils And Wisdom Teeth? Obsessed w/ DNA- Harvesters of Sorrow
The high value of RNA preserved specimens begs the question, are doctors performing unnecesary procedures to collect/sell them?
This is bombshell information from Enterthe5t4rz.
Ever notice that they don’t take wisdom teeth or tonsils out anymore? Probably because they’ve found a better way to extract DNA from us..probably at birth.
They stored the DNA from everyone’s tonsils and wisdom teeth. In most cases, those procedures were completely pointless.
And I’ve ALWAYS wondered if ancestry.com and 23 and Me weren’t setup by the powers that be themselves. Ever since I first heard about their “DNA service” when a friend of mine told me about how she’d sent in her DNA to them to find out what nationalities she was I had alarm bells ringing in my head like “Say what?” Now who do we know thats obsessed with bloodlines and DNA? That’s right…the elite. I’ve always thought it was dangerous to willingly submit a DNA sample to ancestry.com. Check out this video. I think this goes even farther than we know.
The elite would LOVE to have all of our DNA on file in order to determine who lives and who dies. They are totally obsessed with bloodlines and DNA.
And I have to add this….even though I know most will scoff and not believe me, I’ve decided to throw it out there to warn the few that will. I received Intel from two totally separate sources who don’t know each other….the second source is a friend who is in one of the intelligence agencies. He is one of the few good guys left. Both of these sources told me just two days apart from each other that the ppl who got on the FEMA prison barges during the Texas hurricane were killed out at sea and replaced with organic robotoids (clones). The people who came off the FEMA prison barges were soulless organic robotoids. This also has to do with the mysterious Google barges that are being stored off the coast of Texas and San Francisco…. remember how it was a huge mystery what was in them or what they were for? Well according to both my sources these Google barges hold information on every man, woman and child in the world….and I’m assuming that IF they have your DNA it is stored there as well. These Google barges hold the information they need to clone every human being….because this is what they want….they want soulless puppets. I don’t care if you think that’s fantastical…. it’s the truth and I have very good reason to believe the two people who told me this. When I heard it from the first person I was skeptical….but then to get independent confirmation from my friend in the intelligence agency…who didn’t know my first source. This was confirmation to me. Take it how you will. I’m just the messenger. Sherry Shriner always used to say that only one out of every three people is real now….I still have a hard time swallowing that one…but who knows… maybe she’s right. Either way, what’s going on away from public view right now is more wicked than we could ever comprehend.
In this next video this guy shows how ancestry.com’s aerial view shows a pyramid in the middle and is right next to Utah’s big NSA center and a whole bunch of other federal buildings. Coincidence?
NEVER…I REPEAT…NEVER WILLINGLY SEND YOUR DNA IN TO ANY OF THESE COMPANIES. BY NOW I’D IMAGINE THAT THEY MOST LIKELY HAVE THE DNA OF EVERY SINGLE PERSON…BUT ON THE SMALL CHANCE THEY’VE MISSED YOU…IT SURE WOULD BE A TRAVESTY TO WILLINGLY SEND IT TO THEM.

What do we do with them?
We sterilize and discard, or incinerate them as we do with all hazardous medical waste.

They DO NOT discard them. Watch the video and look at the references within it. They are STORED indefinitely in biobanks and then SOLD for research WITHOUT the consent, many times of the parents or donors.

OK.. I watched the vid.  Wher does it say third molars and tonsils are ‘kept’ (not destroyed)?
I have removed thousands of wisdom teeth over the years, and have destroyed all of them, Except those submitted for pathology analysis), as do all the dentists I know.

Enterthe5t4rz
I was a pharmaceutical rep for 7 years and a lab rep for 5. I worked with pathologists and had a close relationship with biobanks. tissue is stored, not destroyed. If you a doctor, you should know that. I show in the video several biobanks with TONSILS listed in their inventory for sale to to the government ofr genetic research. Anyone can go to the site in the video and see the inventory for themselves. The question here is not IF they do it. It’s WHY and CONSENT.
